name: places/ChIJ8QgbPQP0wokRD8WxrzQcedk
adrFormatAddress: 4482 Broadway, New York, NY 10040-2606, USA

originalText.text: The staff at Lino Press were so friendly and helpful! They got me my prints very quickly as well. I’ll be sure to come back again soon!

text.text: The staff at Lino Press were so friendly and helpful! They got me my prints very quickly as well. I’ll be sure to come back again soon!

originalText.text: I was a bit hesitant walking into this shop based on the previous reviews but I must say I was pleasantly surprised! The receptionist that I encountered must be a new one because she was very courteous and professional! My order was done sooner than I expected and the quote was less then the one I received at the previous place I used. I highly recommend this business.

text.text: I was a bit hesitant walking into this shop based on the previous reviews but I must say I was pleasantly surprised! The receptionist that I encountered must be a new one because she was very courteous and professional! My order was done sooner than I expected and the quote was less then the one I received at the previous place I used. I highly recommend this business.

originalText.text: This business needs to take a training in customer service for greeting and receiving customers. I lost my Mother last week in a tragic accident and I did not receive any sympathy nor kindness while doing business with them. There is a woman who sits in an office at the entrance and she acknowledges your presence in a very ungracious manner. After selecting my choice of memory card I received an email that same day with a sample to be approved. The samples were missing allot of the details that the sample had. I was back and forth with them via email and they just had a blah attitude about this whole order. Finally, after several days someone by the name of Hector assisted me and he made this experience a bit easier. At least, that is the impression they gave me. I had to literally cross the GW bridge go inside the back of the office and sit in front of their system and guide the guy through the details. How can someone who does this kind of work day in and day out not see these details. Someone else might have signed the sample away. But I couldn't because I pay allot of attention to detail. Besides this was not just another nightclub or event party order. This was an order of a life that was lost. They need to be more professional and show kindness. Especially, knowing that they are handle an order for a deceased loved one. I hope they consider these points and improve. I will definitely not use them again. It felt so uncomfortable dealing with them.

originalText.text: Great service! Great attention to detail! I will certainly return! Ask for Hector he is the best!

text.text: Great service! Great attention to detail! I will certainly return! Ask for Hector he is the best!

originalText.text: I hate to write this, because at first things were well, I used them multiple times, and overlooked the print flaws like sizing being off, or wrong thickness of paper being used, or their ignoring my request to have no border on my design...but communication became increasingly worse, no response to my email s, being told a print would be complete by end of day only to show up and have them start working on it to now...they’re total unwillingness to print my designs (I’m going to assume bc I don’t request a large enough quantity). I made it known I would be a consistent returning customer and they’ve only consistently let me down. Would have been great to support a printing press in my own neighborhood.

I made it known I would be a consistent returning customer and they’ve only consistently let me down. Would have been great to support a printing press in my own neighborhood.
